snippet: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is right to take on the poorly regulated, private student lending industry.
abstract: Editorial applauds the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau for taking on the poorly regulated, private student lending industry; holds if the bureau does its job properly, more students will opt to take out affordable student loans and bad private lenders will be more quickly called to account.
lead_paragraph: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is right to take on the poorly regulated, private student lending industry.
